{"request_hash":"request:magazine:3ed927ef63ef70e3ddc009870454c07aae911fd0","request_cached":false,"request_cache_expiry":86400,"meta":{"mal_id":21,"type":"manga","name":"Hana to Yume","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/magazine/21/Hana_to_Yume"},"manga":[{"mal_id":102,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/102/Fruits_Basket","title":"Fruits Basket","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/2/155964.jpg?s=be752b213e00729b97d47cefbf494e1d","synopsis":"Tooru Honda is an orphan with nowhere to go but a tent in the woods, until the Souma family takes her in. However, the Souma family is no ordinary family, and they hide a grave secret: when they are hugged by someone of the opposite gender, they turn into animals from the Chinese Zodiac!

Now, Tooru must help Kyou and Yuki Souma hide their curse from their classmates, as well as her friends Arisa Uotani and Megumi Hanajima. As she is drawn further into the mysterious world of the Soumas, she meets more of the family, forging friendships along the way.

But this curse has caused much suffering; it has broken many Soumas. Despite this, Tooru may just be able to heal their hearts and soothe their souls.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"1998-07-17T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":23,"members":98056,"genres":[{"mal_id":22,"type":"manga","name":"Romance","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/22/Romance"},{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":23,"type":"manga","name":"School","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/23/School"},{"mal_id":8,"type":"manga","name":"Drama","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/8/Drama"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"},{"mal_id":37,"type":"manga","name":"Supernatural","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/37/Supernatural"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":1873,"type":"people","name":"Takaya, Natsuki","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/1873/Natsuki_Takaya"}],"score":8.48,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":610,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/610/Skip_Beat","title":"Skip Beat!","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/2/26110.jpg?s=b57a8af1a4962718446e78bfe352e015","synopsis":"Sixteen-year-old Kyouko Mogami followed her childhood friend and love interest Shoutarou "Shou" Fuwa to Tokyo to support him while he works toward his dream of becoming a top idol in the entertainment industry. But after finding out that Shou considers her as little more than a mere housekeeper, she swears to enact revenge by entering the entertainment industry herself and beating him at his own game!

However, Kyouko's revenge plan suffers a setback almost immediately when she is rejected by the talent agency of her choice. Fortunately, the president of the agency gives her a second chance, and places her in the newly made "Love Me" section. Kyouko then begins her long journey to stardom, cultivating her skills as an actress and forming relationships with new friends along the way.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"2002-02-14T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":null,"members":70025,"genres":[{"mal_id":22,"type":"manga","name":"Romance","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/22/Romance"},{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":8,"type":"manga","name":"Drama","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/8/Drama"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":2536,"type":"people","name":"Nakamura, Yoshiki","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/2536/Yoshiki_Nakamura"}],"score":8.64,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":21525,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/21525/Akatsuki_no_Yona","title":"Akatsuki no Yona","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/3/153249.jpg?s=bf5b73eb4bb880eb6ed8d783afb0a703","synopsis":"Once upon a time, the kingdom of Kouka was ruled by a red dragon in human form. By his side, four warriors imbued with dragon blood helped him lead the kingdom to prosperity. Time passed, and this tale became a legend to tell children.

As the sole princess of Kouka, Yona lives a life of lavish ease. In love with her cousin, Su-won, and protected by her bodyguard, Son Hak, she wants for nothing and remains sheltered from the harrowing reality outside the castle walls. Contrary to this peaceful illusion, Kouka is about to undergo a political upheaval. After her beloved Su-won stages a bloody coup and murders her father, Yona is forced to flee with only Hak by her side.

Though surrounded by enemies on all sides, the banished princess still yearns to save her kingdom. Her solution comes from an exiled priest, who tells her that her only hope is to find the four legendary dragon warriors. Guided by this seemingly fictitious myth, Yona sets out to find these warriors, determined to restore her kingdom.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"2009-08-04T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":null,"members":68991,"genres":[{"mal_id":22,"type":"manga","name":"Romance","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/22/Romance"},{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"},{"mal_id":10,"type":"manga","name":"Fantasy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/10/Fantasy"},{"mal_id":1,"type":"manga","name":"Action","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/1/Action"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":2426,"type":"people","name":"Kusanagi, Mizuho","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/2426/Mizuho_Kusanagi"}],"score":8.86,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":8157,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/8157/Kamisama_Hajimemashita","title":"Kamisama Hajimemashita","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/1/167521.jpg?s=ceba2d63f06da99e56d08d3213faaaa9","synopsis":"Nanami Momozono is alone and homeless after her dad skips town to evade his gambling debts and the debt collectors kick her out of her apartment. So when a man she's just saved from a dog offers her his home, she jumps at the opportunity. But it turns out that his place is a shrine, and Nanami has unwittingly taken over his job as a local deity!

Nanami has all kind of new responsibilities she doesn't understand, dangers she's unaware of, and a cranky ex-familiar who's...actually pretty hot. What's a new-fledged godling to do?

Until the handsome uncle of two-year-old twins offers her a raise if she'll be their babysitter. Accustomed to making sacrifices for them, she is all too familiar with disappointment and the pain of suppressing her true feelings.

Though expecting nothing to become of them, Machida becomes the basketball club manager in order to be closer to her crush. But at the start of the new school year, Shou Naruse joins the team. He is extremely talented... and has taken an interest in Machida. Stoic-faced and cold, she is unfazed by his advances, despite how relentless he is when it comes to winning her love—from kissing her with no warning to asking for permission to grope her. Keeping her cool and focusing on basketball becomes a much more difficult task when Naruse makes no effort to conceal his desires.

Volume 11: Shoku no Miyako (Food Paradise)","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"2003-02-25T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":17,"members":33147,"genres":[{"mal_id":22,"type":"manga","name":"Romance","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/22/Romance"},{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":23,"type":"manga","name":"School","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/23/School"},{"mal_id":8,"type":"manga","name":"Drama","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/8/Drama"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":2908,"type":"people","name":"Minami, Maki","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/2908/Maki_Minami"}],"score":8.01,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":320,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/320/Gakuen_Alice","title":"Gakuen Alice","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/1/190844.jpg?s=40cf6231d628a183f2e220741bbb2a5f","synopsis":"For Mikan, there was no better friend than Hotaru (though Hotaru sometimes seems to have other sentiments). They often played together. But Hotaru is a very special child, and she agrees to go to a school in Tokyo which the government reserved only for geniuses. This left a very lonely Mikan at home. When Hotaru fails to keep her promise and come home for holidays, her young friend is very disappointed and rather angry. But upon overhearing a conversation between Hotaru's mother and a teacher, Mikan realizes that her friend's reasons for leaving might not have been what they seemed. So Mikan takes it upon herself to run away and go to Hotaru's school. There she discovers the so-called "genius academy" is actually a school for people gifted with special powers called "alices." Her friend Hotaru is one of these, and after a chance encounter with a teacher, Mikan suddenly finds herself enrolled. Finally, the two friends are reunited, but is Mikan actually one of those so-called Alices?

(Source: Aerie Scans)","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"2002-09-04T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":31,"members":31874,"genres":[{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":23,"type":"manga","name":"School","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/23/School"},{"mal_id":8,"type":"manga","name":"Drama","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/8/Drama"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"},{"mal_id":31,"type":"manga","name":"Super Power","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/31/Super_Power"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":2306,"type":"people","name":"Higuchi, Tachibana","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/2306/Tachibana_Higuchi"}],"score":8.36,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":7749,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/7749/Oresama_Teacher","title":"Oresama Teacher","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/4/186262.jpg?s=da19f2210d2a6cfd2cd10da110895b5d","synopsis":"Under the threat of being disowned, Mafuyu Kurosaki—an ex-delinquent with a strong sense of justice, exceptional fighting skills, and a very dense head—has to start a new life as a proper citizen and student at Midorigaoka Academy. Apart from adapting to a new school, Mafuyu also has to get used to living alone as the dorms are full. Therefore, she starts a new chapter in her life with limited funds, the inability to make even a cup of instant noodles, and a big dream of becoming "an ultra-shiny female high school student."

This dream, however, is quite hard to fulfill since Mafuyu's sense of style is uncouth, and troubles tend to find her no matter how hard she tries to avoid them. The path to her dreams is made more difficult because of Takaomi Saeki, her unordinary homeroom teacher with barely legal teaching methods, and her delinquent classmate Kaori Hayasaka, who becomes her first new friend.

Oresama Teacher follows Mafuyu's adventure full of hilarious situations, ridiculous misunderstandings, and exciting action sequences, all while she still tries to become a normal feminine girl.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]","type":"Manga","publishing_start":"2007-07-04T00:00:00+00:00","volumes":null,"members":30667,"genres":[{"mal_id":4,"type":"manga","name":"Comedy","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/4/Comedy"},{"mal_id":23,"type":"manga","name":"School","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/23/School"},{"mal_id":25,"type":"manga","name":"Shoujo","url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/genre/25/Shoujo"}],"authors":[{"mal_id":3624,"type":"people","name":"Tsubaki, Izumi","url":"https://myanimelist.net/people/3624/Izumi_Tsubaki"}],"score":8.22,"serialization":["Hana to Yume"]},{"mal_id":57,"url":"https://myanimelist.net/manga/57/Hanazakari_no_Kimitachi_e","title":"Hanazakari no Kimitachi e","image_url":"https://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/manga/2/186895.jpg?s=0c34455d799b0c52006710d65cb66cf3","synopsis":"Japanese-American track-and-field star Mizuki has gotten herself to transfer to a high school in Japan...but not just any school! To be close to her idol, high jumper Izumi Sano, she's going to an all-guys' high school...and disguising herself as a boy! But as fate would have it, they're more than classmates...they're roommates! Now, Mizuki must keep her secret in the classroom, the locker room, and her own bedroom. And her classmates—and the school nurse—must cope with a new transfer student who may make them question their own orientation...

(Source: VIZ Media)
